title: Rear Suspension Units - Installation

body.body: Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
An unstable motorcycle may fall, causing injury to the operator or damage to the motorcycle.
Locate the suspension units to the mounting spigots, articulating the swinging arm until the distance between the upper and lower spigots allows the units to fit.
Fit the washer and new mounting bolt to the upper mounting and tighten to
Fit a new mounting bolt and lock nut to the lower mounting and tighten the bolt to
Repeat steps 2 and 3 for the other rear suspension unit (if removed).
Remove the wheel support (if fitted), lower the motorcycle to the ground and park it on the side stand.
